org.apache.tephra.distributed

Class TransactionServiceThriftClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.tephra.distributed.TransactionServiceThriftClient

  • public class TransactionServiceThriftClient
extends Object
    This class is a wrapper around the thrift tx service client, it takes Operations, converts them into thrift objects, calls the thrift client, and converts the results back to data fabric classes. This class also instruments the thrift calls with metrics.
